item.title: 迪士尼首次实现流媒体盈利，浏览量居首；乐园业绩令人失望
item.description: 华特迪士尼公司公布的第三季度业绩超出华尔街预期，流媒体业务首次实现盈利，电影业务扭亏为盈，抵消了主题公园的低迷表现。【原文：Walt Disney Co. reported third-quarter results that beat Wall Street estimates, with its first-ever profit in streaming and a turnaround in the movie business countering a sluggish performance at its theme parks.】

item.title: 据称亿万富翁阿达尼计划为旗舰项目筹资 12 亿美元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，亿万富翁高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）的旗舰公司正在考虑通过出售股份筹集约 1000 亿卢比（12 亿美元）至 1200 亿卢比的资金，此举将紧随其输电部门最近的另一项筹资交易。【原文：Billionaire Gautam Adani’s flagship firm is considering raising around 100 billion rupees ($1.2 billion) to 120 billion rupees through a share sale, according to people familiar with the matter, a move that would follow a separate recent fundraising deal at his power transmission unit.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。日本央行发出的鸽派信号为股市复苏注入了新的动力，而欧洲一些大公司发布的财报却令人失望。以下是交易员们正在谈论的话题。【原文：Good morning. Dovish signals from the BOJ give fresh legs to the recovery in stocks, while some of Europe’s biggest companies release disappointing earnings. Here’s what traders are talking about. — David Goodman】

item.title: 交易员抓住风险偏好脆弱回归的机会，债券下跌
item.description: 随着本周早些时候笼罩全球市场的恐慌情绪继续消退，美国和欧洲的政府债券纷纷下跌。【原文：Government bonds across the US and Europe fell as the panic that gripped global markets earlier this week continued to subside.】

item.title: CVS 再次下调业绩展望，启动 20 亿美元成本削减计划
item.description: CVS Health 公司股价下跌，原因是该公司连续第三个季度下调了 2024 年的盈利展望，并宣布了削减成本的措施，以在几年内节省 20 亿美元，因为医疗保健支出持续飙升。【原文：CVS Health Corp. shares fell as the company lowered its 2024 earnings outlook for the third straight quarter and announced cost-cutting measures to save $2 billion over several years as health-care expenses continue to soar.】

item.title: 英普拉茨公司减记 10 亿美元，将因价格下跌而报告亏损
item.description: 安派达铂金控股有限公司（Impala Platinum Holdings Ltd.）表示，即将公布的财报将包括198亿兰特（约合10.8亿美元）的减值，并警告称在铂族金属回落之后，预计全年将出现亏损。【原文：Impala Platinum Holdings Ltd. said its upcoming financial results will include impairments of 19.8 billion rand ($1.08 billion) and warned it’s expecting to swing to a full-year loss after platinum-group metals retreated.】

item.title: HPE 140 亿美元收购瞻博网络交易获英国反垄断法批准
item.description: 惠普企业公司斥资 140 亿美元收购瞻博网络公司（Juniper Networks Inc.【原文：Hewlett Packard Enterprise Co.’s $14 billion deal to buy Juniper Networks Inc. was cleared by the UK’s antitrust watchdog, paving the way for the firm to expand its presence in networking.】

item.title: 预订量和前景不及预期，Lyft 股价下滑
item.description: Lyft Inc. 公布的第二季度预订量和第三季度展望低于华尔街预期，导致该公司股价下滑。【原文：Lyft Inc. shares slid after the ride-hailing company posted second-quarter bookings and a third-quarter outlook that fell short of Wall Street’s expectations.】

item.title: 美国 10 年期国债拍卖收益率一年来首次低于 4
item.description: 最近几天，美联储迅速大幅降息的预期推动了债券反弹，在此之前，美国准备一年来首次以低于 4% 的收益率出售 10 年期国债。【原文：The US is poised to sell 10-year Treasuries at a yield below 4% for the first time in a year, after a bond rally in recent days that was fueled by expectations of rapid and large interest-rate cuts from the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 史蒂文-姆努钦（Steven Mnuchin）说，是时候扼杀他创造的新国债了
item.description: 只要看一眼美国债券曲线，就会发现有些不对劲。有一种国债--20 年期国债--脱离了市场的其他部分。它徘徊在远高于其周围债券收益率的水平上。【原文：It only takes a quick glance at the US bond curve to realize something is off. One Treasury security — the 20-year — is detached from the rest of the market. It hovers at yields that are far higher than those on the bonds surrounding it — the 10-year and the 30-year.】

item.title: 非洲中央银行出手支撑下滑的货币
item.description: 非洲各国的中央银行正在加紧对本国市场进行不协调的干预，以支撑其下滑的货币，抑制输入性通胀。【原文：African central banks are stepping up uncoordinated interventions in their markets to prop up their slumping currencies and dampen imported inflation.】

item.title: 商业游说团体称，瑞士央行必须迅速采取行动应对强势法郎
item.description: 瑞士最大的制造商游说团体表示，瑞士国家银行必须尽快采取措施，防止法郎走强对出口商造成伤害。【原文：The Swiss National Bank must do something fast to keep the franc’s strength from hurting exporters, according to the country’s biggest lobby group for manufacturers.】

item.title: 星展集团任命陈文辉为副首席执行官，古普塔为接班做准备
item.description: 星展集团控股有限公司（DBS Group Holdings Ltd.）挑选陈素珊担任首席执行官古普塔（Piyush Gupta）的副手，为她最终成为领导东南亚最大银行的首位女性奠定了基础。【原文：DBS Group Holdings Ltd. picked Tan Su Shan as deputy to Chief Executive Officer Piyush Gupta, setting the stage for her to eventually become the first woman to lead Southeast Asia’s largest bank.】

item.title: S&P公司称孟加拉国政治危机加剧增长风险
item.description: S&P全球评级公司表示，孟加拉国的政治危机进一步加剧了经济增长、财政表现和外部指标的下行风险。【原文：Bangladesh’s political crisis has further exacerbated downside risks to economic growth, fiscal performance, and external metrics, S&P Global Ratings said.】

item.title: 日本央行鸽派言论令日元走软，新兴市场松了一口气
item.description: 在日本央行承诺不加息、缓解日元汇率和所谓利差交易压力之后，发展中国家股市连续第二天上涨，新兴货币指数也趋于稳定。【原文：Developing market stocks rose for a second day and an index of emerging currencies stabilized after the Bank of Japan pledged not to raise interest rates, easing the yen and pressure on so-called carry trades.】

item.title: 据称 KKR 计划在 40 亿美元的私有化交易中竞购富士软公司
item.description: 据知情人士透露，KKR & Co.已决定通过收购要约收购富士软公司，并将这家软件开发商私有化。【原文：KKR & Co. has decided to acquire Fuji Soft Inc. through a takeover bid and take the software developer private, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 黄金价格屡创新高，中国人民银行继续暂停购买黄金
item.description: 在贵金属飙升至历史新高之际，中国央行在 7 月份连续第三个月没有购买任何黄金。【原文：China’s central bank didn’t buy any gold for a third straight month in July, as the precious metal surged to record high.】

item.title: 法律与amp; General上半年运营利润符合预期
item.description: 法律与通用集团公司（Legal & General Group Plc）公布的营业利润几乎达到预期，即使由于其固定福利客户调整投资组合，客户在今年上半年从其资产管理部门撤资 313 亿英镑（400 亿美元）。【原文：Legal & General Group Plc reported operating profit that almost met estimates even as clients pulled £31.3 billion ($40 billion) from its asset management arm in the first half of the year due to adjustment of portfolios by its defined benefit clients.】

item.title: 马士基的大船订单包括液化气燃料船
item.description: 船运巨头 A.P. Moller-Maersk A/S 公司通过电子邮件发表声明称，作为其船队更新计划的一部分，该公司正在寻找 50-60 艘船只。【原文：Shipping giant A.P. Moller-Maersk A/S is in the process of securing 50-60 vessels as part of its fleet renewal program, according to an emailed statement.】

item.title: 意大利可能提高富人的外国所得税：新快报
item.description: 意大利可能对新居民的国外收入提高统一税率，这将使该国成为全球富人的首选目的地。【原文：Italy may raise a flat tax regime on new residents’ foreign income that is turning the country into a top destination for the global wealthy.】

item.title: 泰晤士河水务公司同意就许可证违规提前采取特别措施
item.description: 泰晤士水务有限公司（Thames Water Ltd.）同意接受独立审查，以避免因上个月违反许可证规定而被处以巨额罚款。【原文：Thames Water Ltd. agreed to independent scrutiny to avoid hefty fines for breaching its license last month.】

item.title: 原见 "技术指标显示日经 225 指数已触底反弹
item.description: 2011年海啸引发的日本股市溃败，根据准确预示短期底部的图表形态，日本股市数十年来最大的抛售暂时告一段落。【原文：The biggest selloff in decades for Japanese stocks is over for now, according to a chart pattern that accurately signaled the short-term bottom of a rout triggered by the 2011 tsunami.】

item.title: 迪拜机场在创纪录的半年度客流量后上调年度客流量预测
item.description: 迪拜国际机场在上半年吸引了创纪录的游客数量后，上调了今年的客流预测，超过了 2018 年最繁忙的客流。【原文：Dubai International Airport raised its forecast for passenger numbers this year, surpassing its busiest inflow in 2018, after the emirate attracted a record number of visitors in the first half.】

item.title: 美国销售强劲，日元走软，本田利润创历史新高
item.description: 本田汽车公司第一季度营业利润创历史新高，原因是美国市场的强劲销售抵消了中国市场的放缓，使这家日本第二大汽车制造商有望在今年再创利润新高。【原文：Honda Motor Co. operating profit rose to an all-time high in the first quarter as strong sales in the US overcame a slowdown in China, putting Japan’s second largest automaker in line for another year of record profit.】

item.title: 高盛认为中国电动汽车供过于求的局面将得到缓解
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs）的分析师认为，中国的海外商品泛滥现象将在未来几年内发生改变，尽管电动汽车和钢铁行业的情况不太可能得到缓解。【原文：China’s overflow of goods abroad is set to change course in the next few years, according to Goldman Sachs analysts, though relief isn’t likely for electric vehicles and steel.】

item.title: 彪马因货运成本和中国经济放缓而下调盈利目标
item.description: 由于货运成本上升，消费者情绪低落，尤其是在中国，彪马 SE 下调了今年的利润预期。【原文：Puma SE watered down its profit outlook for the year amid higher freight costs and muted consumer sentiment, especially in China.】

item.title: 英国经济 2022 年的增长超过此前预期
item.description: 最新数据显示，2022 年英国经济产出增长较快，经受住了两位数通胀和政治动荡的影响，好于最初的预期。【原文：The UK economy weathered the impact of double-digit inflation and political turmoil better than initially thought in 2022, according to updated figures showing a faster rise in output.】

item.title: 德国工业生产因汽车增长超预期
item.description: 德国 6 月份的工业生产有所增长；这为欧洲最大经济体带来了一些好消息，因为上个季度该经济体意外萎缩。【原文：German industrial production rose in June — offering some good news for Europe’s largest economy after it unexpectedly shrank last quarter.】

item.title: 股东反对，Glencore放弃退出煤炭行业计划
item.description: Glencore Plc 在表示将退出煤炭业务后仅九个月，就放弃了分拆煤炭业务的计划。【原文：Glencore Plc has abandoned plans to spin off its coal unit just nine months after saying it would exit the profitable but polluting business, after discussions with its shareholders who pushed back against the plan.】

item.title: 市场必须在一次反弹之后继续前行
item.description:
此次抛售对全球金融板块的破坏在数周内还不会显现。【原文：

The selloff’s damage to the tectonic plates of global finance won’t be clear for weeks.

】
